title: Dionysii Halicarnasei Quae Exstant, Volumen Quintum
Opsuculorum, Volumen Prius
monogr.author: Dionysius of Halicarnassus

p.#text:
e)gw\ me/n u(pela/mbanon a)rkou/ntws dedhlwke/nai to\n 
*qoukudi/dou xarakth=ra, ta\ me/gista kai\ kuriw/tata tw=n
u(parxo/ntwn peri\ au)to\n i)diwma/twn e)pecelqw/n, e)n oi(=s
ge dh\ ma/lista diafe/rein e)/doce/n moi tw=n pro\ au)tou=
r(hto/rwn te kai\ suggrafe/wn, pro/teron me\n e)n toi=s
peri\  tw=n a)rxai/wn r(hto/rwn pro\s to\ so\n o)/noma suntaxqei=sin 
u(pomnhmatismoi=s, o)li/gois  dh\ pro/sqen
xro/nois e)n th=| peri\ au)tou= tou= *qoukudi/dou kataskeuasqei/sh|
grafh=| proseipw\n to\n *ai)/lion *toube/rwna, e)n
h(=| pa/nta ta\ deo/mena lo/gou meta\ tw=n oi)kei/wn a)podei/cewn
diecelh/luqa kata\ th\n e)mautou= du/namin: sou= de\ 
u(polamba/nontos h(=tton h)kribw=sqai ta\s grafa/s, e)peidh\
proekqe/menos a(/panta ta\ sumbebhko/ta tw=| xarakth=ri
to/te ta\s peri\ au)tw=n pi/steis pare/xomai, a)kribeste/ran

de\ th\n dh/lwsin tw=n i)diwma/twn tou= xarakth=ros e)/sesqai
nomi/zontos, ei) para\ mi/an e(ka/sthn tw=n proqe/sewn ta\s
le/ceis tou= suggrafe/ws paratiqei/hn, o(\ oi( ta\s te/xnas
kai\ ta\s ei)sagwga\s tw=n lo/gwn pragmateuo/menoi poiou=sin,
proelo/menos ei)s mhde\n e)llei/pein kai\ tou=to pepoi/hka,
to\ didaskaliko\n sxh=ma labw\n a)nti\ tou= a)podeiktikou=.

add:
proshgoriko\n
ge/nhtai, to\ de\ proshgoriko\n o)nomatikw=s
p.#text:
i(/na de\ eu)parakolou/qhtos o( lo/gos soi ge/nhtai, 
proqei\s kata\ le/cin, o(/sa peri\ tou= suggrafe/ws tugxa/nw
proeirhkw/s, e)pitroxa/dhn a)nalh/yomai tw=n proqe/sewn
e(ka/sthn kai\ ta\s a)podei/ceis pare/comai, kaqa/per h)ci/ous.
e(/petai de\ toi=s peri\ *(hrodo/tou grafei=sin ta\ me/llonta
dhlou=sqai. tou/tw| ga\r *qoukudi/dhs tw=| a)ndri\ e)pibalw\n
kai\ toi=s a)/llois w(=n pro/teron e)mnh/sqhn, kai\ sunidw/n,
a(\s e(/kastos au)tw=n e)/sxen a)reta/s, i)/dio/n ti ge/nos xarakth=ros,
ou)/te pezo\n au)totelw=s ou)/t' e)/mmetron a)phrtisme/nws,
koino\n de/ ti kai\ mikto\n e)c a)mfoi=n e)rgasa/menos ei)s th\n
i(storikh\n pragmatei/an e)spou/dasen ei)sagagei=n: e)pi\ me\n
th=s e)klogh=s tw=n o)noma/twn th\n tropikh\n kai\ glwtthmatikh\n
kai\ a)phrxaiwme/nhn kai\ ce/nhn le/cin paralamba/nwn
polla/kis a)nti\ th=s koinh=s kai\ sunh/qous toi=s
kaq' e(auto\n a)nqrw/pois, e)pi\ de\ tw=n sxhmatismw=n, e)n

oi(=s ma/lista e)boulh/qh dienegkei=n tw=n pro\ au(tou=, plei/sthn
ei)senegka/menos pragmatei/an, tote\  me\n lo/gon e)c
o)no/matos poiw=n, tote\ de\ ei)s o)/noma suna/gwn to\n lo/gon:
kai\ nu=n me\n to\ r(hmatiko\n o)nomatikw=s e)kfe/rwn, au)=qis
de\ tou)/noma r(h=ma poiw=n: kai\ au)tw=n ge tou/twn a)nastre/fwn 
ta\s xrh/seis, i(/na to\ me\n o)nomatiko\n  le/ghtai,
kai\ ta\ me\n paqhtika\ r(h/mata drasth/ria, ta\ de\
drasth/ria paqhtika/: plhquntikw=n de\ kai\ e(nikw=n a)lla/ttwn
ta\s fu/seis kai\ a)ntikathgorw=n tau=ta a)llh/lwn, 
qhluka/ t' a)rrenikoi=s kai\ a)rrenika\ qhlukoi=s kai\ ou)de/tera
tou/twn tisi\n suna/ptwn, e)c w(=n h( kata\ fu/sin
a)kolouqi/a plana=tai: ta\s de\  o)nomatikw=n h)\
metoxikw=n ptw/seis tote\ me\n pro\s to\ shmaino/menon
a)po\ tou= shmai/nontos a)postre/fwn, tote\ de\ pro\s to\ 
 shmainome/nou: e)n de\ toi=s sundetikoi=s
kai\ toi=s proqetikoi=s mori/ois kai\ e)/ti ma=llon e)n

toi=s diarqrou=si ta\s tw=n o)noma/twn duna/meis poihtou= 
tro/pon e)necousia/zwn. plei=sta d' a)/n tis eu(/roi par'
au)tw=| tw=n sxhma/twn, prosw/pwn te a)postrofai=s kai\
xro/nwn e)nallagai=s kai\ tropikw=n shmeiw/sewn metaforai=s
e)chllagme/na kai\ soloikismw=n lamba/nonta fantasi/as:
o(po/sa te gi/netai pra/gmata a)nti\ swma/twn h)\
sw/mata a)nti\ pragma/twn, kai\ e)f' w(=n e)nqumhma/twn te
kai\ nohma/twn ai( metacu\ paremptw/seis pollai\ gino/menai
dia\ makrou= th\n a)kolouqi/an komi/zontai, ta/ te
skolia\ kai\ polu/ploka kai\ dusece/likta kai\ ta\ a)/lla
ta\ suggenh= tou/tois. eu(/roi d' a)/n tis ou)k o)li/ga kai\
tw=n qeatrikw=n sxhma/twn kei/mena par' au)tw=|, ta\s
parisw/seis le/gw kai\ paromoiw/seis kai\ paronomasi/as
kai\ a)ntiqe/seis, e)n ai(=s e)pleo/nase *gorgi/as o( *leonti=nos
kai\ oi( peri\ *pw=lon kai\ *liku/mnion kai\ polloi\ a)/lloi
tw=n kat' au)to\n a)kmasa/ntwn. e)kdhlo/tata de\ au)tou= kai\
xarakthrikw/tata/ e)sti to/ te peira=sqai di' e)laxi/stwn
o)noma/twn plei=sta shmai/nein  pra/gmata kai\ polla\ 
suntiqe/nai noh/mata ei)s e(\n kai\  e)/ti prosdexo/meno/n
ti to\n a)kroath\n a)kou/sesqai katalipei=n, u(f' w(=n a)safe\s
gi/netai to\ braxu/. i(/na de\ sunelw\n ei)/pw, te/ssara me/n

e)stin w(/sper o)/rgana th=s *qoukudi/dou le/cews, to\ poihtiko\n
tw=n o)noma/twn, to\ polueide\s tw=n sxhma/twn, to\
traxu\ th=s a(rmoni/as, to\ ta/xos th=s shmasi/as: xrw/mata
de\ au)th=s to/ te strifno\n kai\ to\ pikro\n kai\ to\ pukno\n
kai\ to\ au)sthro\n kai\ to\ e)mbriqe\s kai\ to\ deino\n kai\ 
fobero/n, u(pe\r a(/panta de\ au)tou= tau=ta to\ paqhtiko/n.
toioutosi\ me\n dh\ ti/s e)stin o( *qoukudi/dhs kata\ to\n
th=s le/cews xarakth=ra, w(=| para\ tou\s a)/llous dih/negken.

*glwsshmatika\ me\n ou)=n kai\ a)phrxaiwme/na kai\ dusei/kasta 
toi=s polloi=s e)sti to/ te a)kraifne/s kai\ o( e)pilogismo/s 
kai\ h( periwph/ kai\ h(  a)nakwxh/ kai\ ta\
o(/moia tou/tois. poihtika\ de\ h(/ te kwlu/mh kai\ h( pre/sbeusis
kai\ h( kataboh/ kai\ h( a)xqhdw/n kai\ h( dikai/wsis kai\ ta\ paraplh/sia.
h( d' e)n toi=s sxhmatismoi=s kaino/ths te kai\ polutropi/a 
kai\ h( e)callagh\ th=s sunh/qous xrh/sews, e)n h(=|
ma/lista diafe/rein au)to\n h(gou/meqa tw=n a)/llwn, e)pi\
tou/twn gi/gnetai tw=n e)/rgwn fanera/:

quote:
h)=n ga\r o( *qemistoklh=s bebaio/tata dh\ fu/sews i)sxu\n
dhlw/sas kai\ diafero/ntws ti e)s au)to\ ma=llon e(te/rou
a)/cios qauma/sai.

ou)d' au)= kata\ peni/an, e)/xwn de/ ti a)gaqo\n dra=sai th\n
po/lin, a)ciw/matos a)fanei/a| kekw/lutai
peso/ntos de\ au)tou=

ei)s th\n pareceiresi/an
h( a)spi\s perierru/h.

peso/ntos de\ au)tou= e)/cw th=s new\s e)pi\ ta\ proe/xonta
me/rh th=s ei)resi/as
p.#text:
o(/tan me\n ou)=n mi/an le/cin ei)/te o)nomatikh\n ei)/te r(hmatikh\n 

e)n plei/osin o)no/masin h)\ r(h/masin e)kfe/rh| perifra/zwn
th\n au)th\n no/hsin, toiau/thn poiei= th\n le/cin:
 kai\ mh\n e)n tw=| e)pitafi/w| ge/grafen:
: kai\ ga\r e)n 
tou/tois to\ su/ntomon poiei= to\n lo/gon toiou=ton, w(s 
e)pi\ tou= *lakedaimoni/ou *brasi/da te/qhken, o(/te maxo/menos
peri\ *pu/lon a)po\ th=s new\s traumati/as geno/menos
e)ce/pesen:  fhsi/n  bou/letai ga\r dhlou=n:
 .

p.quote:
dikaiw/mata me\n ou)=n ta/de pro\s u(ma=s
e)/xomen, parai/nesin de\ kai\ a)ci/wsin xa/ritos toia/nde.
p.add:
kai\ h( o)lo/fursis h(\n e)n th=|
prw/th| bu/blw|
p.#text:
e)n oi(=s de\ ta\ r(hmatika\ mo/ria th=s le/cews o)nomatikw=s
 sxhmati/zei, toiau/thn poiei= th\n fra/sin: e)/stin de\ au)tw=|
pro\s *)aqhnai/ous o( *kori/nqios e)n th=| prw/th| bu/blw|
ta/de le/gwn: 
to\ ga\r parainei=n kai\ a)ciou=n r(h/mata o)/nta o)nomatika\

ge/gonen parai/nesis kai\ a)ci/wsis. tau/ths e)sti\ th=s
i)de/as h(/ te ou)k a)potei/xisis tou=  *plhmmuri/ou h(
e)n th=| e(bdo/mh| bu/blw|  te/qhken e)n dhmhgori/a|. to\ ga\r a)poteixi/sai
kai\ to\ o)lofu/rasqai r(hmatika\ o)/nta o)nomatikw=s 
e)sxhma/tiken a)potei/xisin kai\ o)lo/fursin.

p.quote:
th\n me\n ou)=n a)lhqesta/thn ai)ti/an, 
lo/gw| de\ a)fanesta/thn, tou\s *)aqhnai/ous oi)/omai mega/lous
ginome/nous a)nagka/sai ei)s to\ polemei=n.
p.#text:
o(/tan de\ a)ntistre/yas e(kate/rou tou/twn th\n fu/sin 
ta\ o)no/mata poih=| r(h/mata, tou=ton to\n tro/pon e)kfe/rei
th\n le/cin, w(s e)n th=| prw/th| bu/blw| peri\ th=s ai)ti/as
tou= pole/mou gra/fei:  bou/letai
ga\r dhlou=n, o(/ti mega/loi gigno/menoi oi( *)aqhnai=oi
a)na/gkhn pare/sxon tou= pole/mou: pepoi/hken de\ a)nti\ th=s
a)na/gkhs kai\ tou= pole/mou o)nomatikw=n o)/ntwn r(hmatika\ 
to/ te a)nagka/sai kai\ to\ polemei=n.

p.quote:
ou)/te ga\r e)kei=no
kwlu/etai tai=s spondai=s ou)/te to/de.
p.#text:
o(/tan de\ tw=n r(hma/twn a)lla/tth| ta\ ei)/dh tw=n paqhtikw=n 
kai\ poihtikw=n, ou(/tw sxhmati/zei  to\n lo/gon:

ou)/te ga\r e)kei=no kwlu/ei tai=s spondai=s ou)/te to/de: to\
ga\r kwlu/ei r(h=ma e)nerghtiko\n u(pa/rxon a)nti\ tou= kwlu/etai
paqhtikou= o)/ntos parei/lhptai: h)=n de\ to\ shmaino/menon
u(po\ th=s le/cews toiou=to:  kai\ e)/ti ta\ e)n ta=|
prooimi/w| lego/mena: th=s ga\r e)mpori/as ou)k ou)/shs, ou)d'
e)pimignu/ntes a)dew=s a)llh/lois: kai\ ga\r  tou/tois
to\ e)pimignu/ntes e)nerghtiko\n u(pa/rxon r(h=ma tou= e)pimignu/menoi
paqhtikou= o)/ntos xw/ran e)pe/xei.

quote:
h(mw=n de\ o(/soi
me\n *)aqhnai/ois h)/dh e)nhlla/ghsan
h(mw=n de\ o(/soi me\n *)aqhnai/ois sunh/llacan
tou\s d' e)n th=| mesogei/a| ma=llon katw|khme/nous
p.#text:
o(/tan de\ a)nti\ tou= poihtikou= to\ paqhtiko\n paralamba/nh|,
 tou=ton sxhmati/zei to\n tro/pon: : bou/letai me\n ga\r
dhlou=n: ,
parei/lhfen de\ to\ e)nhlla/ghsan paqhtiko\n u(pa/rxon
a)nti\ poihtikou= tou= sunh/llacan. kai\ to\ e)pifero/menon
tou/tw|: :
a)nti\ ga\r tou= poihtikou= r(h/matos tou= katw|khko/tas to\
paqhtiko\n parei/lhfen to\ katw|khme/nous.

quote.#text:
kai\ ei)/

tw| a)/ra pare/sthken to\n me\n *surako/sion, au(to\n de\ ou)
pole/mion ei)=nai tw=| *)aqhnai/w|:

quote:
kai\ to\n pole/mion deino/teron e(/comen, mh\ r(a|di/as au)tw=| 
pa/lin ou)/shs th=s a)naxwrh/sews

me/xri ga\r tou=de 
a)nektoi\ oi( e)/painoi/ ei)sin peri\ e(te/rwn lego/menoi, e)s
o(/son a)\n kai\ au)to\s e(/kastos oi)/htai i(kano\s ei)=nai dra=sai/
ti w(=n h)/kousen

quote.#text:
tw=| de\ u(perba/llonti au)to\n  fqonou=ntes h)/dh kai\ 
a)pistou=sin

p.#text:
para\ de\ ta\s tw=n e(nikw=n te kai\ plhquntikw=n diafora/s, 
o(/tan e)nalla/tth| th\n e(kate/rou tou/twn ta/cin,
e(nika\ me\n a)nti\ plhquntikw=n ou(/tws e)kfe/rei:  bou/letai me\n ga\r tou\s
*surakosi/ous le/gein kai\ tou\s *)aqhnai/ous, pepoi/hken
de\ tw=n o)noma/twn e(ka/teron e(niko/n. kai\ e)n oi(=s fhsin:
: tou\s ga\r polemi/ous
e)sxhma/tiken e(nikw=s, ou)xi\ plhquntikw=s. a)nti\ de\ tou=
e(nikou= to\ plhquntiko\n paralamba/nei tou=ton to\n tro/pon
e)calla/ttwn th\n sunh/qh fra/sin: kei=tai de\ h( le/cis
 tw=| prooimi/w| tou= e)pitafi/ou: : to\ ga\r e(/kastos kai\ to\ h)/kousen e(nika/,
ta\ d' e)pifero/mena tou/tois plhquntikw=s e)cenh/nektai:
 ou) kaq' e(no\s le/gesqai pefu/kasin, a)lla\
kata\ pollw=n.

quote:
oi( de\ *)aqhnai=oi
to\ me\n boulo/menon ou)k a)fh|re/qhsan u(po\ tou=
o)xlw/dous th=s paraskeuh=s,

w(/ste ei) mh\ dunastei/a| ma=llon h)\ i)sonomi/a|
e)xrw=nto tw=| e)pixwri/w| oi( *qessaloi/

w(/ste ei) mh\
dunastei/a| ma=llon h)\ i)sonomi/a| e)xrw=nto th=| e)pixwri/w| oi( *qessaloi/.
p.#text:
a)rrenikw=n de\ kai\ qhlukw=n kai\ ou)dete/rwn a)ntimetata/ceis 
e)kbebhkui=ai tw=n sunh/qwn sxhma/twn ai(
toiai/de ei)si/n, o(/tan th\n me\n taraxh\n ta/raxon kalh=| to\ 
qhluko\n e)kfe/rwn a)rrenikw=s kai\ th\n o)/xlhsin o)/xlon,

th\n de\ bou/lhsin kai\ th\n du/namin to\ boulo/menon le/gh|
kai\ to\ duna/menon: w(s e)pi\ tw=n *)aqhnai/wn te/qhken,
o(/te th\n ei)s *sikeli/an a)pe/stellon stratia/n:  kai\ e)n oi(=s peri\ tw=n *qessalw=n
ei)/rhken: : kai\ ga\r
e)ntau=qa ou)de/teron pepoi/hken to\ qhluko/n: h)=n de\ to\
shmaino/menon u(po\ th=s le/cews toio/nde:

quote:
swfrosu/nhn ga\r labou=sai
ai( po/leis kai\ a)/deian tw=n prassome/nwn e)xw/rhsan
e)pi\ th\n a)/ntikrus e)leuqeri/an, th=s a)po\ tw=n
*)aqhnai/wn u(pou/lou eu)nomi/as ou) protimh/santes.

swfrosu/nhn ga\r labou=sai ai( po/leis
kai\ a)/deian tw=n prassome/nwn e)xw/rhsan e)pi\ th\n a)/ntikrus
e)leuqeri/an, th\n a)po\ tw=n *)aqhnai/wn u(/poulon 
eu)nomi/an ou) protimh/sasai.
kai\ mh\ tw=| plh=qei au)tw=n kataplage/ntes

kai\ mh\ to\
plh=qos tw=n polemi/wn kataplage/ntes.

th=|
para\ tw=n qew=n o)rgh=| fobei=sqai
th\n tw=n qew=n o)rgh/n.
p.#text:
e)n oi(=s de\ ta\s ptw/seis tw=n o)noma/twn kai\ tw=n
proshgoriw=n kai\ tw=n metoxw=n kai\  sunaptome/nwn
 tou/tois a)/rqrwn e)calla/ttei tou= sunh/qous, 
ou(/tws sxhmati/zei :  oi(
me\n ga\r a)kolou/qws th=| koinh=| sunhqei/a| sxhmati/zontes
th\n fra/sin tw=| te qhlukw=| ge/nei th=s proshgori/as to\

qhluko\n a)\n e)/zeucan mo/rion, kai\ th\n ptw=sin 
th\n ai)tiatikh\n  a)nti\ th=s genikh=s e)/tacan
to\n tro/pon to/nde:  oi( de\ ta\ a)rrenika\ toi=s
qhlukoi=s sunta/ttontes, w(/sper ou(=tos pepoi/hken, 
ta\s genika\s a)nti\ tw=n ai)tiatikw=n ptw/sewn paralamba/nontes
soloiki/zein a)\n u(f' h(mw=n le/gointo. kai\ e)/ti
ta\ toiau=ta: : 
ou) ga\r e)pi\ th=s dotikh=s ptw/sews e)sxhmati/sqai th\n
le/cin h(/rmotten, a)ll' e)pi\ th=s ai)tiatikh=s:  ou)de\ ga\r  le/goit' a)/n tis, a)lla\

quote:
kai/toi ei)
r(a|qumi/a| ma=llon h)\ po/nwn mele/th|, kai\ mh\ meta\ no/mwn
to\ ple/on h)\ tro/pwn a)ndrei/as e)qe/loimen kinduneu/ein,
perigi/netai h(mi=n toi=s te me/llousin a)lgeinoi=s mh\ proka/mnein 
kai\ e)s au)ta\ e)lqou=si mh\ a)tolmote/rois tw=n a)ei\
moxqou/ntwn fai/nesqai

tou= te
ga\r xwri/ou to\ duse/mbaton h(me/teron nomi/zw, o(\ meno/ntwn
me\n h(mw=n su/mmaxon gi/netai: u(poxwrh/sasi de\ kai/per
xalepo\n o)\n eu)/poron e)/stai.
p.#text:
h( de\ para\ tou\s xro/nous tw=n r(hma/twn e)kbebhkui=a 
to\ kata/llhlon fra/sis toiau/th ti/s e)sti: : e)ntau=qa ga\r to\ me\n e)qe/loimen

r(h=ma tou= me/llonto/s e)sti xro/nou dhlwtiko/n, to\
de\ perigi/gnetai tou= paro/ntos. a)ko/louqon d' a)\n h)=n,
ei) sune/zeucen tw=| e)qe/loimen to\ perie/stai  to\ me\n ga\r  gi/netai tou= 
paro/ntos e)sti/, to\ de\ e)/stai tou= me/llontos xro/nou
dhlwtiko/n. ge/gonen de\ kai\ para\ ta\s ptw/seis sxhmatismo\s
a)kata/llhlos: e)pi\ me\n ga\r th=s genikh=s ptw/sews
e)cenh/noxen to/ te metoxiko\n o)/noma to\ meno/ntwn
kai\  a)ntonomastiko\n to\ h(mw=n, e)pi\ de\ th=s dotikh=s
to\ u(poxwrh/sasin: oi)keio/teron d' h)=n kai\ tou=to kata\
th\n au)th\n e)cenhne/xqai ptw=sin.

quote:
tw=n de\ *surakosi/wn o( dh=mos e)n pollh=| pro\s
a)llh/lous e)/ridi h)=san

quote.#text:
*leonti=noi ga\r a)pelqo/ntwn *)aqhnai/wn

e)k *sikeli/as meta\ th\n su/mbasin poli/tas te 
e)pegra/yanto pollou\s kai\ o( dh=mos e)peno/ei th\n gh=n
a)nada/sasqai

p.#text:
o(/tan de\ pro\s to\ shmai=non a)po\ tou= shmainome/nou
pra/gmatos th
 a)postrofh
 poih=tai h)\ pro\s to\ shmaino/menon

p.#text:
pro/swpa de\ par' au)tw=| ta\ pra/gmata gi/netai, kaqa/ 
per e)n th=| *korinqi/wn pro\s *lakedaimoni/ous dhmhgori/a|
ge/gonen: a)ciw=n ga\r o( *kori/nqios tou\s proesthko/tas
th=s *peloponnh/sou fula/ttein au)th=s to\ a)ci/wma pro\s
ta\s e)/cw po/leis, oi(=on para\ tw=n pate/rwn pare/labon, 
tau=ta le/gei:  e)chgei=sqai h)\ : to\ ga\r e)chgei=sqai nu=n te/qhken e)pi\
tou= proa/gein e)/cw th\n *pelopo/nnhson h(goume/nous au)th=s:
tou=to de\ th=| xw/ra| me\n a)du/naton h)=n sumbh=nai, th=| de\ 
do/ch| kai\ toi=s pra/gmasin toi=s peri\. au)th\n u(pa/rxousin
dunato/n, kai\ bou/letai tou=to dhlou=n.
pra/gmata de\ a)nti\ swma/twn ta\ toiau=ta u(p' au)tou=
gi/netai: le/getai de\ u(po\ tou= *korinqi/wn presbeutou=
pro\s *lakedaimoni/ous sugkri/nontos ta/ te *)aqhnai/wn 
kai\ *lakedaimoni/wn: : me/xri me\n ou)=n
tou/twn to\ sxh=ma th=s le/cews sw/|zei th\n a)kolouqi/an,
w(s e)pi\ prosw/pwn a)mfote/rwn kei/menon. e)/peita a)postre/fetai
kata\ qa/teron tw=n merw=n o( lo/gos, kai\ a)nti\
swma/twn pra=gma gi/netai  peri\ tou\s *lakedaimoni/ous,
o(/tan fh=|: : to\ ga\r u(me/teron a)nti\ tou= u(mei=s parei/lhptai,
pra=gma u(pa/rxon a)nti\ sw/matos.

quote:
*eu)rusqe/ws e)n th=| *)attikh=|
u(po\ *(hrakleidw=n a)poqano/ntos, *)atre/ws de\ mhtro\s
a)delfou= o)/ntos au)tw=|, kai\ e)pitre/yantos *eu)rusqe/ws, o(/t'
e)stra/teue, *mukh/nas te kai\ th\n a)rxh\n kata\ to\ oi)kei=on 
*)atrei=: tugxa/nein de\ au)to\n feu/gonta to\n pate/ra dia\
to\n *xrusi/ppou qa/naton: kai\ w(s ou)ke/ti a)nexw/rhsen
*eu)rusqeu/s, boulome/nwn kai\ tw=n *mukhnai/wn fo/bw|
tw=n *(hrakleidw=n, kai\ a(/ma dunato\n dokou=nta ei)=nai kai\
to\ plh=qos teqerapeuko/ta tw=n *mukhnai/wn te kai\ o(/swn 
*eu)rusqeu\s h)=rxen th\n basilei/an *)atre/a paralabei=n.
p.#text:
a)fiknou/menai, di' a(\s h( fra/sis dusparakolou/qhtos gi/netai,
plei=stai me/n ei)sin kaq' o(/lhn th\n i(stori/an: 
a)rke/sousi de\ e)k tou= prooimi/ou du/o lhfqei=sai mo/nai, 
h(/ te dhlou=sa th\n a)sqe/neian tw=n a)rxai/wn th=s *(ella/dos
pragma/twn kai\ ta\s ai)ti/as a)podidou=sa: 
, kai\ h( peri\ th=s *eu)rusqe/ws
stratei/as e)pi\ th\n *)attikh\n h(/de:

quote.#text:
th\n de\ tw=n e)nanti/wn timwri/an poqeinote/ran
au)tw=n labo/ntes kai\ kindu/nwn a(/ma to/nde ka/lliston
nomi/santes e)boulh/qhsan tou\s me\n timwrei=sqai tw=n d'
e)fi/esqai, e)lpi/di me\n to\ a)fane\s tou= katorqw/sein 
e)pitre/yantes, e)/rgw| de\ peri\ tou= h)/dh o(rwme/nou sfi/sin 
au)toi=s a)ciou=ntes pepoiqe/nai: e)n tw=| a)mu/nesqai paqei=n
ma=llon h(ghsa/menoi h)\ e)ndo/ntes sw/|zesqai to\ me\n ai)sxro\n
tou= lo/gou e)/fugon, to\ d' e)/rgon tw=| sw/mati u(pe/meinan
kai\ di' e)laxi/stou kairou= tu/xhs a(/ma a)kmh=| th=s do/chs
ma=llon h)\ tou= de/ous a)phlla/ghsan.

h)=n ga\r o( *qemistoklh=s bebaio/tata
dh\ fu/sews i)sxu\n dhlw/sas kai\ diafero/ntws ti e)s
au)to\ ma=llon e(te/rou a)/cios qauma/sai. oi)kei/a| ga\r cune/sei,
kai\ ou)/te promaqw\n ei)s au)th\n ou)qe\n ou)/t' e)pimaqw\n
tw=n te paraxrh=ma di' e)laxi/sths boulh=s kra/tistos
gnw/mwn kai\ tw=n mello/ntwn e)pi\ plei=ston tou= genhsome/nou
a)/ristos ei)kasth/s: kai\ a(\ me\n meta\ xei=ras e)/xoi,
kai\ e)chgh/sasqai oi(=o/s te: w(=n de\ a)/peiros ei)/h, kri=nai
i(kanw=s ou)k a)ph/llakto: to/ te a)/meinon h)\ xei=ron e)n tw=|

a)fanei= e)/ti proew/ra. kai\  to\ cu/mpan ei)pei=n, fu/sews
me\n duna/mei, mele/ths de\ braxu/thti kra/tistos dh\ ou(=tos
au)tosxedia/zein ta\ de/onta e)ge/neto.

p.#text:

me\n kai\ para\ du/namin tolmhtai/ kai\ para\ gnw/mhn kinduneutai/:

to/lma me\n ga\r

p.#text:
oi( de\ meirakiw/deis sxhmatismoi\ tw=n a)ntiqe/twn te 
kai\ paromoiw/sewn kai\ parisw/sewn, e)n oi(=s oi( peri\ to\n 
*gorgi/an ma/lista e)pleo/nasan, h(/kista tw=| xarakth=ri
tou/tw| prosh/kontes, au)sthra\n e)/xonti th\n a)gwgh\n kai\
tou= komyou= plei=ston a)festhko/ti, toiou=toi/ tine/s ei)si
para\ tw=| suggrafei=:  kai\ e)/ti de/: : kai\ e)n oi(=s
ta\s katalabou/sas th\n *(ella/da sumfora\s dia\ ta\s 
sta/seis e)pece/rxetai toia/de gra/fwn: 
polla\ toiau=ta/ tis a)\n eu(/roi di' o(/lhs au)tou= th=s i(stori/as 
lego/mena, i(kana\ de\ kai\ tau=ta dei/gmatos e(/neka ei)rh=sqai.

*)/exeis, w)= fi/le *)ammai=e, ta\ parathrh/mata kaq'
e(/kaston au)tw=n e)k th=s koinh=s e)chtasme/na pragmatei/as, w(s e)pezh/teis.
